website_summaries.verdict: Smaller women with slender ankles should choose these comfortable cuffs.
pros: Good for light resistance training at home
Cuffs ensure they stay snug and well-positioned on your ankles
Can be used on wrists, too
Choice of pair of 1, 2, 5 or 8 pound weights
cons: Not recommended for customers with larger ankles

customer_reviews.title: Stays On, Great For Wearing Around The House
customer_reviews.text: As a first time ankle weight user, I realized that these were going to be too heavy to wear while going on a walk/run, but I love to wear them around the house doing normal household chores-my legs are sore every time I use them! The velcro is strong and I've had no problem with them staying on (and I have worked up quite the sweat wearing these!)
customer_reviews.author: nickfuego

customer_reviews.title: They fit my tiny wrists & ankles and stay put!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 4'11" petite woman with child-size wrists and ankles so it's difficult to find gear that fits properly. I bought the 5lbs set and 2lbs set to use for both ankles and wrists. They wrap around and stay put without scraping my skin. The material is fantastic even while I'm drenched in sweat they stay in place on my tiny wrists and ankles. I've had several great workouts and my husband is able to use them as well. They are durable and comfortable and I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Panchita Villa

customer_reviews.title: Sand-Filled Ankle Weights
customer_reviews.text: These ankle weights are filled with sand or something like sand and when they are worn, the material inside all runs to the bottom. I have to wear these upside down sometimes to make the filling drop the other way. There's no way I could have known this without wearing them, but then I couldn't return them. On the outside of these in large lettering is "Healthy Model Life" in pink and white, which is not something I want written on anything I wear. As a female, having that written on ankle weights isn't that bad, but a male would not want to purchase these. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Bleu Lorax

customer_reviews.title: Good for use with a low impact machine but not for walking.
customer_reviews.text: These are cool. I have a low impact glider which has zero resistance so i needed a little extra challenge. The ankle weights offer that additional challenge on the machine, but I do have a hard time just walking around with them. It's not that they are too heavy, but rather they are bigger and more cumbersome and so hurt a little for walking. Maybe put them over socks or sweats. Other than that caution, they are well made and the Velcro holds well. I'd recommend them to a friend who wanted more of a challenge than the 2 or 3 lb weights.
customer_reviews.author: ILB

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I bought these.
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I was looking for. After reading many reviews and questions, I still wasn't sure if these would work. The best thing about these are the closures. There are no skinny straps. The Velcro closure does not contact my skin. The weight is not bulky or lumpy. These just fit on my ankles and I am medium boned. If you are big boned, they may not work. I bought one pound weights but will be ordering 2 pounds soon.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian A. Collins

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars! Recommend Highly!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect leg weights. I have 5lb each and they are too heavy so I bought these today and I couldn't be more pleased. They are comfortable. The 2lbs per leg are balanced for me and the velcro closure stays closed during your workout. They are not too cumbersome so I can wear the under my work scrubs too. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product worked as the description described however the link that's provided on the card does not work for free gear
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband.... the fit is great... he's 202lbs and the 5lbs(in each foot) are perfect for him... the material is soft enough to wear without a sock underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: OK Leg Weight
customer_reviews.text: These weights are nicely made but are difficult to make tight around the ankles. The sections are vertical and pouchy which makes it hard to tighten them. Horizontal sections or straps would probably make it easier to tightento get a good fit. It's annoying to exercise and have the weights moving around the ankle.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon L

customer_reviews.title: Perfect👌 And so stylish!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time purchasing this product. I originally purchased 4-pound weights in 2015, and I wore them 4-5 X’s a week for years, I jog and work-out with them, always. My original product still works, but it is worn down from daily usage. Thus, I wanted a new pair to go with my new gym outfits. They go on easy and are completely comfortable. And they are super stylish!!!! 💖💁🏾‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Doasm Memoir: VBJ

customer_reviews.title: Look no further. Worth the few dollars extra for a high quality ankle weight
customer_reviews.text: I have worked in fitness industry for a decade. These were worth every penny and will probably last for years. So surprised how comfortable they were! I purchased the 8# pair a few weeks ago and they have perfect weight distribution, are made of high quality materials, have plenty of sturdy/high quality velcro and are comfy/have great cushion all around the weight as well. I was debating purchasing a cheaper pair, but am SOOO glad I spent the few dollars more for this brand. Will buy more in different sizes if needed and would highly recommend. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: These smelled so bad! Stunk up the whole house.
customer_reviews.text: They probably would have been good if they didn't smell so bad. Gave me an instant headache and I couldn't even keep them in the house because of the strong rubber smell. They have to be toxic! Disgusting! Sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy P.

customer_reviews.title: Great Weights
customer_reviews.text: I've only used these once so my review may change with time, but so far so good. 1 pound may not seem like much, but it's enough to add a good amount of resistance when you are doing pilates or barre type exercises, which is what I use them for. You could also add them on for walking. These fit around my ankle perfectly and they stay in place - no sliding or coming undone.
customer_reviews.author: anon1

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable secure fit
customer_reviews.text: Purchase these ankle weights for my 11-year ole daughter to use at hitting lessons. She plays fast-pitch softball and has a habit of sliding her back foot. Causing her to lose power, using two 2-pound weights on ankle of her back foot. Helps her maintain balance and drive through the ball. Additionally, she likes to hook both weights together via the hook and loop, and use the set as a weight belt. Overall good product, well constructed and is daughter tells me these ankle weighs are comfortable to wear. The kids likes her comfort. :)
customer_reviews.author: Legally Blind Geek

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable ankle weights.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased and tried several different sets of ankle weights, by different manufacturers. These are the most comfortable ankle weights that I've tried. But, I put them on each morning, and I wear them all day. Even as comfortable as they are, they still can become a little abrasive by the end of the day. However, as I noted, they are the most comfortable ankle weights that I've tried. I wish that these same weights came in a weight that was just a few pounds heavier. Maybe 8 or even 10 lbs each ankle. I would purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: JCF

customer_reviews.title: Fits small ankles!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always had smaller ankles and I’ve tried many different brands of ankle weights and they’ve always been too big. I was going to buy the bala ones but I thought I’d try these first. I can’t speak to their longevity but they fit securely and comfortably around my ankles and stayed on all through my workout.
customer_reviews.author: Jess + Andy

customer_reviews.title: FAVORITE AMAZON PRODUCT!! BEST ANKLE/WRIST WEIGHTS
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these ankle/wrist weights. I only got the 0.5lbs but they work for me as I do a lot of pilates & HIT style repetitive exercises and can see a big difference in the shape of my hips and legs. I have used heavier ones from other brands in the past and they strained my muscles. Since they are so comfortable, I also wear them in the house when I am walking around. My weights didn't smell, they came immaculately packaged in a beautiful box and I HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!! Probably one of my favorite if not favorite purchases on Amazon. A+++++++
customer_reviews.author: KatJ

customer_reviews.title: a must have for working out
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I bought these on a whim when a friend suggested i add them to my ankles for extra resistance when i walk, what a splendid idea. These were the "amazon recommended choice" when i searched for ankle weights. The material is super soft on the outside so i do not chaff or get any burns from my skin running against that material with sweat. I got the 2Lb weights, you'd be surprised how much an extra 4lb does to a girl, i wear them around the house, when i go for a bike ride, and when i wear long pants at work. Would totally recommend these to anyone :)
customer_reviews.author: Dani Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Too bulky!  Fall off legs!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted me to purchase & they were almost too heavy to wear on your legs, they won't stay on. Maybe the lighter weight ones are better, but these are just too bulky & cumbersome to be functional.
customer_reviews.author: Karl & Jessica S.

customer_reviews.title: Won’t stay attached
customer_reviews.text: I regretfully have not made much use of these since I purchased them. However, I fear they would not have lasted this long if I had since the flap that laps over onto the mesh won’t stay attached. Ive probably used them 40 times. Definitely not enough times. There really is no excuse for this. If this were not a problem I would love them. I’ve had to get creative in order to repurpose them. I wrap them in a back brace and use them instead of buying a weighted vest. It works for now. But I am disappointed since I wanted them for leg workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 5 lb weights and when I put them on I learned that they felt heavier than I thought they would. I do enjoy using them and will likely build up more strength as a result of their weight. However, for anyone that has not used ankle weights before, I would suggest trying them out first. They might find that a slightly lighter weight to be more comfortable. I am in my middle 70s and weigh just under 200 lbs but have been training in and teaching martial arts for the last 25+ years so am in pretty good shape.
customer_reviews.author: S. McHugh

customer_reviews.title: This weight was recommended in my PT recovery from hip surgery
customer_reviews.text: This weight was recommended in my PT recovery from hip surgery. I like how I can secure them around very skinny ankles for no sliding, but there's plenty of strap for any size leg or ankle. Shipment time was crazy good.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rebecca Owens

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever!
customer_reviews.text: These weights are great because they are soft against your skin, easy to put on and STAY ON! I also use them in my hands to do my arm exercises and love them more than holding weight plates or dumbbells. My previous ankle weights came with the D ring and the velcro strap that was a pain to loop through and adjust. They would always get loose somehow and fall off. I purchased the 5 lbs. per weight and am considering getting the 3.5 as well. You would be surprised how hard it is to wear 5 lbs. weights on each leg to do your normal workout! For the price both pairs would be a great fitness investment.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Not just for ladies.
customer_reviews.text: I know these are for "ladies" - the pink "model" logo gives that away, but these are the only 5-8 pound (each) weights that stay on my ankle when doing karate kicks - thanks to the full-width (about 5"-6") Velcro. I have several other ankle weights with a 1" Velcro strap and they move and slide out of position when kicking. Personally I think they should be marketed to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Chicagoland

customer_reviews.title: Not for regular size ankles.
customer_reviews.text: Tried to wrap them around my ankles. In order to get them around my ankle, they had to be doubled up around part of the side, and even then it was not tight enough to stay put. Unless you are putting them on your calf or you have ultra thick ankles, these will not work.
customer_reviews.author: James K

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy
customer_reviews.text: Completely fell apart and leaked after 2 months. Material that lines the product failed.
customer_reviews.author: lucy

customer_reviews.title: Order the right weight !
customer_reviews.text: Well, I have two sets now! The first set I ordered was a 5 lb set. But , I didn't realize that it would be 5lbs each ankle weight , which is really big and cumbersome and heavy! So, I had to reorder another set 2.5 lbs each ankle weight which Totals the 5 lbs. The good thing is they are well made, comfortable, and I will use the heavy ones for stronger training. So, be sure to order the right weight! And get in shape! :))
customer_reviews.author: Gigi Star

customer_reviews.title: Like the Sand Type Ankle Weights
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 5lb each ankle weights with the velcro closure. They are comfortable and will fit smaller ankles. Mine are 9" & still have room to adjust in closer to ankle. The only thing I don't care for is the balance. Because it has sand ( I like that) in it for the weight, one section of sand sticks out, like big bulge. I put that towards the back of my ankle so it does not interfer with movement. No big deal really. That is the only con I found & don't know if they can do anything about it. They are very comfortable & do not move once attached to ankles. Yes, I would still recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Deb T.

customer_reviews.title: Great ankle weights!
customer_reviews.text: So I stumble across these while looking for slightly heavier weights for working out. Or just to put on as I walk around the house, doing chores and what Have you. I got the 2 lbs ones for now. It’s enough to add something extra until I build up my strength. And it’s little enough weight to where you don’t notice it if you are busy. They are secure and comfortable. They don’t slide around. The fabric is nice and weight evenly distributed. I will Buy more in heavier weights.
customer_reviews.author: Korey-Storm Brown

customer_reviews.title: Perfect but....
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful ankle weights! Perfect velcro closure! But they.... Smell sooo bad! Will be returning because of intense chemical odor. They are airing out in my garage right now because they can’t even be in the house.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: I love these! I have had total hip replacement both ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I have had total hip replacement both left & right this year and I'm trying to get muscle and strength back with stretches and exercise. I had some ankle weights but they would slip and slide when I tried to do some leg exercises. These do not slide. They fit snuggly around the ankles and remain snug. I use them on my wrists on alternate days to build some upper body strength. These are excellent ankle weights - way better than the other two pair I have owned for many years - and I look forward to buying heavier weights from Stronger as I get "stronger". :)
customer_reviews.author: LlamaMama

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: For me, these weights are perfect. I only wanted 1 pound (each), but I still needed them to be comfortable because I have joint damage in my ankles and feet. These are very soft and comfortable, and they do not slip up and down like some of them I've had in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Susanne Rauch

customer_reviews.title: Couldnt be happier!
customer_reviews.text: I use these weights at the gym and im so happy with the weight distribution and the adhesive on these - they dont come off until you take them off and i love that so much about these because ive had a pair before i bought this one and they would come off mid workout
customer_reviews.author: Milena

customer_reviews.title: They really are made for a woman's body!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best weights I have ever had. I have small ankles and usually have trouble getting a snug fit without extra bands of vinyl and velcro. These fit perfectly and seem to be shaped just right. My wrists are so thin I have never found weights that fit but these do. I don't mean to imply that these wouldn't fit someone heavier, because I think they would do just fine. I'm just amazed to find something that fits my body so well.
customer_reviews.author: S. Mair

customer_reviews.title: These Are Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use in barre workouts. With barre workouts, it is usually high reps with no weights but adding just a bit of weight kicks up intensity. These are perfect for that. I'm not a stranger to lifting heavier weights but it a barre routine, this added 1lb really kicked it up a notch. I wouldn't go higher than this.
customer_reviews.author: C. Figueroa

customer_reviews.title: Great ankle weights
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty good. They are actually the best I've ever used, though admittedly I haven't used any since the late 90's. They are very comfortable and I can get a very tight fit where they don't move at all while I'm doing whatever I do with them. I've even put the two together and wear them like a belt if I want some added weight to my squats, which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: These one pounders pack the punch in being a well made product
customer_reviews.text: These little beauties arrived on time in great packaging and were exactly what I wanted. Thirty + years ago, I wore 5lb weights, but now the one pounders will do what I want and worse come to worse, I'll put two of them around my one ankle to strengthen the one leg that's lagging behind. The quality is excellent and they are very sturdy. The Velcro straps are generous in length and clasp securely. I would recommend them to anyone. (This is not a paid endorsement and I don't receive any monetary gains from my review. I feel it's important to support good products like these.)
customer_reviews.author: Videobarbs

customer_reviews.title: Where have these been my whole life
customer_reviews.text: These are so heavy but that's what I was looking for. Love how they velcro around the inside and just how they fit my legs. Great for walking.
customer_reviews.author: crazedangel78

customer_reviews.title: Loved these and absolutely comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these hoping the negatives reviews were not accurate and I was right. These are not only absolutely comfortable around my ankles, but work great. I have been working out easily with 10Lb weights and knew that I needed greater resistance and these are perfect. I am a petite woman and have fairly small ankles but these fit me just right. They are a little bulky, but for 15lb weights, no more than I would expect. Quality seems very good. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Pritchett

customer_reviews.title: Working from home/working out
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I was looking for. Only downside is that they fall down and hurt the top of your foot a bit (but that’s my own fault because I’m wearing them working from home with no shoes on so if that’s what you were looking to use them for, just be aware of that) but overall they’re perfect, especially for working out. Some reviews said they smelled bad, they had a slight plastic smell to them but I probably wouldn’t have noticed if it wasn’t for all of those bad reviews I read about them. No regrets, 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Avery

customer_reviews.title: Too bulky
customer_reviews.text: I bought the (2x5lbs) and I don't really like it cuz they are too bulky. I feel like I couldn't use them together as they are too bulky for me to move once I put those on. And the strap is not tight enough. So, I normally use one 5lb on one leg and then use my other lighter ankle weights (3lb) on another leg in order to move more easily & smoothly. Overall, I'm not too happy with my purchase and a bit regret.
customer_reviews.author: ChocolateLover

customer_reviews.title: May be too big for x-small ankles
customer_reviews.text: The 5-lbers don't fit x-small ankles well; they simply aren't pliant enough to wrap snugly because of the way the sand inside is distributed in seamed sections. I don't have a measuring tape nearby, but I weigh around 100 lbs. (I got these specifically because reviewers said they were good for small ankles, so now I'm describing mine as x-small.)
customer_reviews.author: Intellectual Romantic

customer_reviews.title: Great weights, but a little bulky.
customer_reviews.text: Great weights, comfortable even weight. Made well, feel good on your ankle. Lost one star for being bulkier than other 5 lb ankle weights I’ve used. Doing reps they rub together and catch. Otherwise a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: William Dodero

customer_reviews.title: Great exercise equipment or just to wear around the house for added resistance to your day.
customer_reviews.text: Great ankle weights to wear during the day to add a little more resistance to your workout, and or just walking, or around the house to add a bit more weight during the course of the day. These are very durable, well stitched, the Velcro enclosures are strong enough to stay on your ankles or wrist all day long. Plus they are comfortable to wear all day long. Definitely worth every dollar to purchase these. Here's to good health!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for daily exercise
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy and great for table top crunches..bicycles..light walking..marches. You dont want to go any higher than 2lbs if you just do normal daily exercise. Perfect quality.
customer_reviews.author: Alison M Lechowicz

customer_reviews.title: Too Small for Adult use.
customer_reviews.text: Weights too small for an adult female's ankle. Even at the largest possible opening, they would not fit around my wife's petite ankle. Too tight even for her small wrist. They might fit the ankle of a child or small animal, but not an adult. Need to add ankle size range to product description.
customer_reviews.author: Big Bear

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: These are super comfortable and fit my ankles great. Only problem is I ordered the 8 pound each weights and when I weighed them they were 4-5 lbs each. I blame some on scale accuracy but it shouldn’t be off three whole pounds each.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie kilhefner

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable enough to wear all day
customer_reviews.text: I had bought ankle weights from another company and had to return due to the weights sliding around on my ankle and being very uncomfortable. I am so glad I found these! I wore them all day at work and hardly even noticed I was wearing them (2lb x2) but I could feel it the next day. They are slim and fit under my scrubs without being visible.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca8502

customer_reviews.title: Not just for your ankles!!
customer_reviews.text: I recently broke my wrist and I was devastated that I could no longer lift weights to stay fit and not lose muscle. I thought of the brilliant idea to buy ankle weights to strap on my arms. PROBLEM SOLVED!! I'm surprised I've never heard of others doing this. I'm now able to workout my shoulders, chest, and arms without holding weights in my hands!! Love these! And yes I'll also use them on my ankles. My wife loves them too lol.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it was due to the weight (5lbs), or if I just have tooo small of wrists and ankles for weights but they would not stay in place, had to start over the work out several times. Normally these are so easy to return and can be dropped off at kohls, but not an option for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly Fitted Ankle Weights
customer_reviews.text: I needed new ankle weights after wearing out another brand when I had to move from 1-5 lbs. Now that I’m stable, I went for comfy ankle weights that stayed put and were easy to fasten. Your ankle weights are perfect. My husband liked them very much, too, so I ordered a pair for him to use in his basement workout area. We both love our weights!
customer_reviews.author: D. Hardin

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these to add more spice to my workout. So far I've used them about 3 times. My only complaint is that the strap isn't long enough to wrap around the ankle, so if your legs are a bit more defined it fits just right, no extra room. I also wish that these came with interchangeable weight plates so you didn't have to order a separate pair, or carry 2 pars with you to the gym as they can be heavy to carry around in a gym bag. other than this, they are decent.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Irizarry

customer_reviews.title: More like a wrist weight than an ankle weight
customer_reviews.text: It is too tight on my angles to be something I could use for any length of time. I don't have unusually large ankles. I think my ankles are pretty average for a woman. I can't imagine this working for anyone but a child.
customer_reviews.author: SusanSays

customer_reviews.title: Cute but..
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t know how to rate this but overall I think I would higher if I would’ve gotten different weight size, they were cute just heavy around my ankles that would cause me to be sore the next few days
customer_reviews.author: Monét

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 30 days, then started showing wear. It looks like any day now, it’ll rip and the sand will fall out. Of course the return policy ended yesterday. I called Amazon and my rep was a sweetheart. She spoke to supervisor who allowed the return. The good... The are nice looking and I never had issues with the sand being uneven. I wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Deshanta

customer_reviews.title: gymnast is happy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a competitive gymnast and needs light weights to add while practicing and working out. These are great and work well for her. She's 8
customer_reviews.author: B.N.A.

customer_reviews.title: Easy Velcro Close
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to do leg doddles to rehab the cartilage in my knees. These seem to make the exercise way more effective. 2 lb weights were recommended to use for the rehab exercise. I really like how easy the Velcro closure makes it to put them on and off. Seem like really good quality. I would definitely recommend this brand
customer_reviews.author: DaveToerper

customer_reviews.title: Hmmm..
customer_reviews.text: Well good thing I know how to sow! Because my shht was delivered RIPPED. Opened up the box and it was the first thing I noticed. It’s a great item though, I like it a lot. Just wished it came undamaged. One star knocked off for the price, especially being delivered ripped (that’s another knocked off star) and the third star is for my time wasted having to sow it.
customer_reviews.author: Shaemora

customer_reviews.title: Superior product.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fabulous! I've had these for my trail running training for almost a year and they're still going strong. Their main use is when I'm on the stairmaster. I've never had any chafing (I have worn them against my skin, and against socks) and they've never fallen off. I have even used them on a 1.5 hour mountain climbing session with over 1600 feet gained and 1600 feet lost IN THE RAIN and they performed like champs. In fact, just writing this review makes me want to buy a second pair just in case I lose these so I will have a backup pair. Fantastic product.
customer_reviews.author: Spittinpigeon

customer_reviews.title: Good Choice Based on All the Positive Reviews
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I disliked about these is that I'm not crazy about having a logo with pink on my weights. Someone tell sports equipment manufacturers that not every female likes pink! They are exactly as described and work great. I paid attention to the reviewers who had tried several different types of these weights, and I think they were spot on in their assessments.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Ive owned other (older style) ankle weights but these are superior. Comfortable to wear, doesn't move around (stays put) and the velcro is secure.
customer_reviews.author: R.G.

customer_reviews.title: Great for now
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfortable! I like that the weight is evenly distributed, besides the obvious weight you won't even feel like you're wearing them. I have used them Over 30min at a time and they do not irritate or get uncomfortable. I would like to mention that I haven't own them for a long time (maybe a few months) therefore I can't speak on the durability.
customer_reviews.author: ggee

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase c:
customer_reviews.text: I went with these because they are pretty discrete and simple ankle weights. Others can be really chunky and bright colored, which isn’t for me. I got the set that is 2lbs each and they are accurately weighed out, comfortable and simple. My neighbor wants a pair so I’ll be purchasing them again.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Don't let the logo deceive you. Will fit large men as well.
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to find one of these that are both on the heavy-side and reasonable. They fit my large overweight 6ft male ankles just fine. The weight is enough to work out my legs under the desk. I tend to bounce my legs, so this at least helps me get a minor work out doing it. They fit snug enough.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce

customer_reviews.title: Great weights!! Will buy again!!
customer_reviews.text: These weight are exactly what I was hoping for! I will order another, heavier set soon. They are made of good material and you can wear the weights against your bare skin with out it rubbing. The weights stay in place with both floor and standing and aerobic types of work outs, due to the strong Velcro closures. I will for sure buy these again!!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I got the 8lb ones because I wanted a very challenging workout. I am petite, 5ft, 100lbs, and these fit around my ankles no problem. Great for leg lifts and wearing around the house. I probably should have worked up to it, but I didn't want to purchase new ones every month or so. Weights aren't adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: AyaPup

customer_reviews.title: Very bulky
customer_reviews.text: I have a bad knee and my physical therapist had me get these to help do traction dangling my leg while sitting on a counter. These weights work great for that but these things are bulky. I personally would not be able to do any type of exercise where you are moving.
customer_reviews.author: Willow

customer_reviews.title: works fine
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my sister who has a physical disability. she said exercising with the weights helped her legs to be stronger
customer_reviews.author: I Bas

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait to Use!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipper! Going to use them for the first time tomorrow - can't wait to see how they help tone my legs.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kerr

customer_reviews.title: Work well without slipping
customer_reviews.text: Great weights for the price. I work from home at a standing desk and these add a bit of resistance and weight to my daily routine. Despite their weight, I quite often forget I have them on. They can secure snug with the built in Velcro strap. I can do in place excercises with them while working. No complaints yet.
customer_reviews.author: ExAvi8tor

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable ankle weights I've owned. The velcro design is nice, they don't slip or pinch when working out. If I wear crop leggings and they are just on my bare skin, they don't irritate my legs at all. Good buy, worth the cost, they are comfortable and don't slide around. I wear them on my eliptical.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole V

customer_reviews.title: Really like this 1 lb each set
customer_reviews.text: Really like this 1 lb each set. Wish a 2 lb each set was available. Very comfortable fit but my legs/ankles are small. Am using the set for physical therapy purposes. Wearing these around house to help that. Could use 2 or 2.5 lb set. Not ready for 5 lb set alternative. Maybe vendor will provide an 'inbetween' 2 lb set in future. ☺ In meantime, happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: VJS

customer_reviews.title: Best feel ankle weights
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect ankle weights for women. Soft but sturdy against the ankles (I have tiny ankles, others feel like hula hoops). The weight is enough to feel a burn, you can even put two on one leg to increase muscle mass. Every time I read healthy model life, I felt like I was using VS angels secret weapon. Only tip is don't take them to the gym, I forgot mine on the bench and someone stole them. I have to save have to wait(<--was going to insert cheesy pun,but didn't. You are welcome) to order another set, but the price is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Castaneda

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly like I thought it would be and I use it for my every day workouts. My ankles are kind of small and I was able to adjust them to fit me perfectly. And they are great if you are want them for stretching purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Jorgia

customer_reviews.title: Nice ankle weights
customer_reviews.text: I like these ankle weights. I got the 2 lb style and they work well. They are soft, easy to adjust and don't rub my legs. I am not a hard core runner, I do power walking so others might get a different result but they are great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Recommend - began with 2lbs
customer_reviews.text: started with the 2lbs because I wasn't sure if 5lbs would be too heavy. Maybe when I get stronger I will purchase them. Just got them everything holding up alright. Highly recommend if you want to up your gains.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Mikaela Pesko

customer_reviews.title: Compact, snug, good-looking ankle weights.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these ankle weights in both the 1 and 2 pound sizes. So far I have only tried the one pound version during a work-out. I have very skinny ankles and it was easy to customize the ankle weights to fit snugly. They did not shift around during my workout and felt very soft and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very odd shape
customer_reviews.text: I have osteoporosis. Small, white, female. Adding weight to combat progression. Not slim. Bulky and difficult to tighten. Do not purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Lee

customer_reviews.title: Nice ankle weights for physical therapy exercises.
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable as ankle weights. I’m working on strengthening my legs a bit after knee surgery. I put these on to do my physical therapy exercises. They have a nice soft cover, and the velcro closure is very effective.
customer_reviews.author: JeanneTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Good for strengthening legs and core
customer_reviews.text: I use these to strengthen my legs for ballet and work on my extensions, they’re very very comfortable and fit nicely. This is a good product. My one issue with this company is that the “free workout” is nowhere to be found on the website they provided nor printed not provided in the box anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Great, but seam ripped after 2 months. Company service is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Love these BUT after two months the seam has ripped at the Velcro. I wrote immediately to the company and explained what happened, and included the Amazon order number. They wrote back the next day offering to replace the pair at no charge. It looks like they may have slightly redesigned them in the meantime too to avoid the ripping seam.
customer_reviews.author: Love to workout

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than a month before tearing...
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money!!! Haven’t even had them a full month and they are already tearing on the inside.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: I love this weights it goes around my ankles I chose ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this weights it goes around my ankles I chose this because the whole weight strap goes around my ankles compared to other brands I don't like the idea of the adjustment strap part rubbing on my skin while im doing my workout and this actually met my expectation its sturdy and it doesn't feel like the cheap ones on amazon that will bother you while working out because on the uncomfortable feeling
customer_reviews.author: gel

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it!! It is the perfect weight for someone that it's just starting to workout and for those who already are an experts. It is very easy to put on and take off. The only thing I noticed it was that it might be a little tight for someone with thick ankle, it is expandable but still. I will definitely buy it again and totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Blanca

customer_reviews.title: Not ideal for long use.
customer_reviews.text: These are really good quality. I do not see them falling apart at all anytime soon. The only complaint I have, is they are not adjustable friendly. They fit my ankles, but I have tiny ankles. They are bulky, so keep that in mind while working out. Also, they do tend to slide to the tops of my feet after wearing them about an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Cailli

customer_reviews.title: Staying Fit
customer_reviews.text: Ankle weights worked fine. Make your you speficfy the pounds you want on each ankle.
customer_reviews.author: Organzier Enthusiast

customer_reviews.title: Premium weight cuffs
customer_reviews.text: These are the most premium--comfort and quality--weight cuffs I've tried of: synergy 10-20 lbs (inferior velcro strap; frayed), MIR 10-20lbs (uncomfortable unless stacked above this HML weight around my ankles.). Only downside could be considered no variable weight adjustment (bags are sewn in)
customer_reviews.author: ♇

customer_reviews.title: Sized for a petite woman's ankles
customer_reviews.text: These weights wrap tightly around my ankles, unlike others I've owned. No sliding down to my feet. However, the overlap is only about an inch on my 9 inch ankles . If my ankles were the slightest bit bigger the band would not fit.
customer_reviews.author: Martha W. Bonney

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are really heavy but I was replacing weights that were just not comfortable at all. These for so well and are so easy to put on I’m actually using them more than I thought I would! I love how comfortable they are.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny's Daughter

customer_reviews.title: Ankle Weights
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these ankle weights! When I first wore them I went up Stone Mountain wearing them 💪🏽💪🏽
customer_reviews.author: Titania Lemon

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product. Does not leak lead dust like my previous ankle weights. I wish they had a strap that secured them in addition to the velcro. I try and run in these and sometimes they still come loose but not near as ofter as previous other weights i had used. They are not perfect but are still good quality
customer_reviews.author: cyrus

customer_reviews.title: Incredible
customer_reviews.text: These ankle weights are awesome! I have been trying to find this style of ankle weights for five years now. These are even better than my old ones, which have bandaids holding them together. The workmanship is superb, and the weights don't slide down my legs. I will be ordering more! Bless you!
customer_reviews.author: V. Hastings

customer_reviews.title: 5 lb Ankle weights
customer_reviews.text: My order of 5lb ankle weights arrived on time and they are Awesome . I recommend these to anyone wanting to step up their workout .The company has emailed me 2 times once to see if they arrived and again to see if I am pleased. NO Company I have ordered from before has had this caring attitude ! Five stars here !!!! Easy to put on and they stay put !
customer_reviews.author: L. Shives

customer_reviews.title: Bulky but nice
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for non-bulky wrists weights, this is NOT the product. They are bulky. However, the weights came in a reasonable time frame and as described. I did not notice a smell. Because they are so bulky it takes me some time to get the weight on my wrists comfortably. However they appear to be well made and the weight distribution is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: shemba03

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Males can use them also. Very comfortable. The professional advice I have received is that ankle weights can be dangerous if not used very carefully. When walking, especially turning corners, with ankle weights can cause knee injuries if not done very carefully.
customer_reviews.author: Mike W

customer_reviews.title: These pass the "running in place" test.  Yes I'm male...
customer_reviews.text: I previously had a pair of conventional ankle weights, but they could only close so much around my leg. Thus, they bounced up and down too much on my leg. These are actually a bit stretchy, so they can wrap around the smallest limbs. These don't bounce all over the place! Kudos to the best ankle weights ever. $45/2×8lb set was well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Mihalovits

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted. I may get wrist weights tooo
customer_reviews.text: I got mine and immediately tried them out to see if they fit. So far- so good. It would take some time to give an overall rating. Im retired now, but when I was working, I use to wear a pair similar to these all day (10 hrs), and what a "wake-up", when they come off. You'll know why if you do too.
customer_reviews.author: Yaya

customer_reviews.title: Wear with long socks!
customer_reviews.text: Wore these for a 4-mile run. They stayed in place and helped make my run more challenging. I gave the weights 4 stars instead of 5 because I received cuts near my feet from the velcro portion after wearing them with no-show socks. DO NOT WEAR THESE WITHOUT LONG SOCKS! That being said, I am sure if I had worn longer socks to reduce friction, I would not have had an issue. Will try using them again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Gaertner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Ankle Weights
customer_reviews.text: They are perfect! I use them for barre classes and they fit perfectly. They don't move around and they are just as described. I wish they came in 1/2 weight sizes because I would have also bought the 1.5# weights if the were available. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Freed

customer_reviews.title: Janet C
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of this item. They are a little large for very small wrists, but are excellent for my prescribed physical therapy. I highly recommend this product and this supplier.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Cunningham

product_meta.title: HEALTHYMODELLIFE Ankle Weights Set by PINC Active - 0.5lb, 1lb, 2lbs, 5lbs and 8lbs Sets - As Worn by Victoria Secret Angels - Used in Top Gyms in New York
feature_bullets: ★ BEST IN QUALITY - Our remarkable cuffs are padded above the competition, keeping you focused on your form, and toning those glutes to perfection. These are Best In Class! Go on, compare us. No wonder our Ankle Weights are standard equipment for Victoria Secret Angels!

★ THE NEXT LEVEL - Increase resistance, and you increase your fitness gains! Combining unbeatable comfort with an enduring design, we help you get from zero to hero faster by adding just the right amount of resistance for your home gym routines!

★ EVERYWHERE YOU ARE - Whether it's a brisk jog on your lunch break, or a mean Pilates session on Saturday, PINC Active Ankle Weights are up to the task and easy to take with you. So, when you need a little extra challenge, we're here to make sure you're getting healthier and stronger!

★ SNUG AS A BUG - You don't have to worry about flipping as our sure stay grip keeps our weights perfectly positioned on your ankles without you having to endure the constant adjustments that some of the other cuffs need.

★ GUARANTEED - Buying online can be scary sometimes. That's why we've made sure your buying experience with PINC Active is as stress free as possible with a ONE YEAR REPLACEMENT OR REFUND GUARANTEE! It's up to you, but if you feel our product hasn't met your needs, just let us know, and we'll do whatever it takes to make it right!
